data.title: Oculus Quest Games & Apps including AppLab Games ( Oculus App Lab )
data.meta_description: Hammer Heads is a VR multiplayer game with multiple game modes like escape, survive, defend, race, hangout, and unique hand movementbased locomotion.You can enjoy games like: Sky Park Explore an elevated playground for climbing, flying, racing, and blaster battles, with challenging rewards to collect. Maze Out Navigate a monsterfilled maze, either finding keys for escape or causing mischief for others, all while hunting for loot. Flag of Honour  Defend the flag from relentless bomb attacks in this intense game requiring teamwork to succeed, with competitive scoring against friends.And more games are coming soon! Flex Your Looks Plus, you can customize your avatar with over 70 animated cosmetics, offering 500+ combinations to showcase your style.Join Hammer Heads community https://discord.gg/YYba9rb9n4Stay sharp, and always watch your head!
